author: malderson
msg: Re-committing 560042: "Fixed DIRSERVER-895, where a server will never accept replication logs until it is restarted if a connection is closed during a replication transaction (e.g. due to a message timeout).  No test for this yet as other issues would prevent it from being reliable."  Hopefully the fix for DIRSERVER-998 will have made the test stable.

author: sebor
msg: * display.h (print_footer): Added an argument for the total number
of programs processed by the utility.
* display.cpp (print_target_verbose): Print stdin, stdout, and stderr
(print_footer_plain): Printed the total number of programs processed
by the utility and avoided printing assertion totals unless they're
* target.h (target_opts): Added infname and outfname members.
to set the names of files to redirect input and output from and
Avoided printing out assertion totals when they're not valid.

author: mriou
msg: Giving tests a little bit more time to complete, timing was a bit tight.
